ðŸ“– Summary: Cheatshh is an interactive command-line interface (CLI) tool written in shell script for managing and accessing command-line cheatsheets. It allows users to store, group, and easily retrieve commands with their descriptions, TLDR, and man pages, reducing the need to memorize commands.
